statements: DELETE FROM account_balance_monitoring WHERE customer_id = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001' AND last_activity_date < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM Alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Critical' AND account_id = 200;
DELETE FROM unusual_activities WHERE account_id = 201 AND activity_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM unusual_activities WHERE activity_description = 'Unauthorized Access';
DELETE FROM customer_alerts WHERE customer_id = 100 AND alert_type = 'Fraudulent Activity';
DELETE FROM unusual_activity_alerts WHERE account_id = 100 AND activity_type = 'Suspicious';
